item.title: Author of the Year at MSSQLTips.com
item.dc:creator: Koen Verbeeck
item.description: I have the pleasure and privilege to announce that I was awarded with the “Author of the Year” award at the MSSQLTips.com website! I am humbled by the recognition of my fellow peers in the SQL Server community and I’d like to thank all of you, the #sqlfamily, for voting. Special shout-out to Jeffery Yao, […]
item.content:encoded:
I have the pleasure and privilege to announce that I was awarded with the “Author of the Year” award at the MSSQLTips.com website!
I am humbled by the recognition of my fellow peers in the SQL Server community and I’d like to thank all of you, the #sqlfamily, for voting.

Special shout-out to Jeffery Yao, who won the Rookie award.

Let’s make 2015 an even better year with more dazzling tips!

item.content:encoded:
I have the great pleasure to announce that I have been nominated for the “Author of the Year” award at the MSSQLTips website.Â This means however I have to persuade people to vote for me, hence this blog post

You can vote for me at the following URL:

http://www.mssqltips.com/MSSQLTipsAuthorVoting.asp

Note that you can cast a vote each day until the end of December, so you can vote for me multiple times!
Also, the votes areÂ distinguished by IP address, so you can use your mobile phone to vote even more!

Thanks in advance!
Koen
